entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few flurries becoming mixed with rain showers late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
